CHATBOT_RESPONSE: Stable relationships at your age are assets—parents and Richard offer both support and accountability. That dynamic shapes how you navigate trust and vulnerability. Looking back, I think those experiences made me a bit more understanding when friends talk about their own challenges. Without clear signs of their investment, the risk outweighs the reward.
